name: the war of cowboy
description:
Start your fantasy adventure in the west town! Cowboy Hunting: Dead Shooter will bring you a different hunting experience.

Criminals are rampant at the border.
Zombies occupied the cemetery.
What does the mystery dancing diva want?
There must be some secrets hidden in the town.

You, as a fearless and free cowboy, will have to make a choice.
To fight against crimes and achieve justice, or to be one of the criminals?

Features:
* Multiple props & gears:
8 cowboy suits, over 30 weapons of different kinds. 6 unique horses. Just put on your best clothes and take the adventure at different cities.

* Diversified quest system:
There’re dozens of quests of different targets, mainline or branch. Follow the mainline quests and unlock more branch quests to win huge rewards.

* Various gifts waiting for you
Win daily rewards by log-in everyday. Not to mention the awesome awards and special offered gifts.

* Simple operation
Control the character with the simple joystick. The buttons are also very easy to learn.
Don’t hesitate any more.
Just come and join the west adventure!
It’s time to show your fearless and power!
